dict.acceptation: 桥；桥牌；鼻梁；起联系作用的东西；
在…建桥，架桥于…之上；通过桥横跨；

sent.orig: Bridge is also in doing his extra training, and Diarra is there also.
sent.trans: Bridge也在进行他的额外训练，Diarra也在那儿。

sent.orig: Lake has a sister bridge, Pavilion Bridge, Bridge.
sent.trans: 湖上有姊妹桥、亭桥、白玉桥。

sent.orig: Nowadays, some new bridge structures such as low cable-stayed bridge and no back inclinedcable-stayed bridge etc.
sent.trans: 现今，矮塔斜拉、无背索斜拉等新颖的桥梁结构型式，在中等跨度的桥型中已占有较大竞争优势，成为许多业主欣赏的新桥型。

sent.orig: Paksey Bridge is the second largest bridge project next to Jamuna Bridge in Bangladesh.
sent.trans: 帕克西桥是孟加拉国继贾木纳桥后的第二大桥梁工程。

sent.orig: Bridge bridge framing companies to undertake projects, water projects, road and bridge and machinery leasing.
sent.trans: 桥梁公司承接桥梁铺架工程、水利工程、并承租路桥机械。
